extension.description: Many thanks to the whole of the [COLOR orange]Ares[/COLOR]Project for everything, this wouldnt have been possible without you guys.. Also thanks to [COLOR blue]ColdKeys[/COLOR] for his contribution towards the code, much appreciated mate... [COLOR yellow]*****I DO NOT HOST THIS MEDIA, I DID NOT UPLOAD THIS MEDIA, I JUST PUT THE LINKS TOGETHER*****[/COLOR] [COLOR green]Tight lines folks and dont forget, when I see you on the bank... Brews on you..[/COLOR] - "[COLOR red]AUTO[/COLOR]"
